item.title: Trump Links Sanctions On Russia To NATO Unity, Calls Out Hungary And Slovakia Over Oil Purchases
item.description: Trump stated that sanctions on Russia would only be imposed if all NATO countries agree to identical measures and halt Russian oil purchases. read mor...

item.title: Trump's Push To Fire Fed Governor Sparks Legal Showdown: 'Era Of Fed Independence Would Be Over'
item.description: In court battle, Fed Governor Lisa Cook fights Trump admin's attempt to remove her ahead of interest rate decision. read more

item.title: Trump To Seal US-UK Tech Pact On AI, Chips And Quantum Computing During London Visit: Report
item.description: The U.S. and UK are set to sign a major tech agreement focusing on AI, semiconductors, and quantum computing. read more

item.title: Moody's Chief Economist Mark Zandi Warns Fed Faces High Bar To Avoid Rate Cuts As Weak Jobs Trump Inflation Risks Ahead Of CPI Report
item.description: Moody's Mark Zandi expects Fed to cut rates next week, citing stalled labor market and rising recession risks. read more
